We are looking for a Head of Learning & Leadership Development to shape the Development and Growth of Zalando’s talent end-to-end. This role will set the course for Zalando’s learning experience as we are implementing a new Learning Management System, and ensure our colleagues’ development needs are addressed through a blend of meaningful and engaging learning content. The role reports into the Director Performance & Growth and acts as a trusted advisor to our key stakeholders on executive- and employee representation level. This is an extraordinary opportunity for an individual with a strong track record of Learning strategy and Academy management, experienced in driving learner-centric capability building in high-performance environments. The team (~10) is located in Berlin, Germany, and the role can be based across Germany as Zalando operates with a hybrid working model.INCLUSIVE BY DESIGNAt Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategyOur employee resource groups https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groupsWHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING) As a key member of the Performance & Growth leadership team, you are responsible for defining and implementing our Learning strategy. Through this, you have the opportunity to design and rethink the future learning experience of employees, leaders and executives at Zalando. You work backwards from business priorities and translate them into meaningful Learning experiences you are responsible for shaping our company-wide curriculum, and with the help of your team, lead the design, development and implementation of our central solutions. You own our Leadership Development curriculum - from entry-level leaders to executives - and ensure offerings are aligned with strategic capability development needs for the different cohorts. You support with expertise, consulting services and facilitation at key leadership events. You own our centralised Learning Governance Framework and work closely with the local Academies to ensure a seamless and consistent learning experience for all Zalandos. You support our BU learning teams on the journey to an aligned strategy and operating model. You leverage relevant metrics and KPIs to assess the impact/effectiveness of programs and adjust strategy based on insights. You work closely with other P&O product domains (e.g. Talent Management, Diversity & Inclusion, Health & Wellbeing) to ensure all programs and initiatives are connected, and contribute to an integrated end-user experience. You contribute as a functional expert to Works Council negotiations on L&D initiatives and related products and processes. You demonstrate values-driven leadership and build an inclusive, empowering and high-performing team culture. WE’D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF You have 10+ years of experience in designing learning organisations/solutions from philosophy to strategy, including implementation planning and execution. You demonstrate subject matter expertise in talent practices with a core focus on L&D. You are able to engage with a wide range of stakeholders, from P&O Business Partners to C-level executives and offer thought leadership based on latest research and industry best practices. You have a thorough understanding of the learning strategy project phases, from gathering requirements and planning, designing and procuring learning experiences, delivering experiences and learning products, through evaluating effectiveness and impact. You enjoy solving problems, with a passion for delivering exceptional levels of customer service. You rely on data analysis to translate meaningful insights and develop a strategy. You possess strong written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills to articulate concepts, ideas, and processes with senior stakeholders. You have a track record of building high-performing teams. If you think you have what it takes, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet every single requirement. THE ROLE & THE TEAMZalando’s Digital Media Team within the Brand Media department is looking for a Media Engineer ( Full stack developer ). Working collaboratively with the media product team, you will play a crucial role in developing automation tools to launch high-budget brand awareness and consideration campaigns. This position is an integral part of our in-house digital media team and will report directly to the Head of Media.INCLUSIVE BY DESIGNAt Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. Your main objective will be to optimize campaigns and automate creative procedures. In order to transform data and establish custom databases that link to advertising platforms and generate real-time ads, you will be required to work with various internal and external APIs. These external APIs include graphAPI (meta), Google DV360 API, YouTube API, TikTok API, and more. Additionally, you will collaborate with various engineering teams to extract webshop data from internal API such as nakadi into the custom database to tie all data together to build real time ads. To illustrate, a project you may work on involves constructing a specialized database that contains details about all products available on the website, encompassing all essential data that is displayed in our ads. This database will be linked to several platforms (meta, google, dv360, tiktok, etc) to ensure that the ads are continuously updated with real-time information. Using this data, you will have the ability to create highly targeted ads that have a significant impact on the business unit objectives. WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FORExperience 3+ years of experience in full-stack development a tech stack that includes either Python, Golang, NodeJS or a JVM language. Knowledge of HTML/CSS (ReactJs), SQL, or Google Apps script is appreciated. Previous experience with (meta, google, dv360, tiktok, etc ) platforms. Experience in working with various advertising systems ( Facebook, Google ads, DV360, Smartly ) Analytical tools ( Google Analytics, Microstrategy, SQL ) Familiar with web programming languages ( Javascript, SQL, Github, Google Ads Script, Google Apps Script, BigQuery ) is a plus Experience with cloud based deployment and development (AWS, Google Cloud) Soft skills A successful full-stack developer should possess both technical and soft skills, including being a self-starter, quick learner, highly motivated team player with strong interpersonal and time management skills, and empathy towards end-users and stakeholders. These skills are essential for working on multiple projects simultaneously while delivering quality work and contributing to the success of their team and organization.Product Methodologies As someone who is well-versed in agile software development methodologies, specifically Scrum Sprint, you possess the ability to create a product roadmap and collaborate with stakeholders to achieve the desired business outcomes. Your product development approach considers technology, design, and client needs in equal measure, ensuring that the end product is both functional and user-friendly.Analytical Skills Your expertise lies in prioritizing the product backlog using both qualitative and quantitative data, and enabling the product team to track relevant metrics that inform a data-driven product strategy.OUR OFFERZalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. e.g. Cassandra, MongoDB, DynamoDB.Excellent communication and collaboration skillsFluency in EnglishAn Analytical thinker, a strong problem solver with a humble & inquisitive approachExcited about working in a fast-moving and agile company where we learn from our mistakesNext steps Get more extensive knowledge of our graduate program on our landing page Follow the instruction to apply Complete the challenge One of our amazing recruiters will contact you and share the information about the next stepsWhat Do We Stand ForAt Delivery Hero, we believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The Corporate Strategy team works directly with Agoda’s management team to provide business critical insights using analytics, ensure cross-functional alignment of goals and execution, and help teams drive strategic initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations and help evolve early-stage ideas into high-impact opportunities.The Opportunity:As a Senior Manager, you will be focusing on leading and contributing to a select number of projects, working with senior stakeholders across the organization. You will get to work closely with senior executives across functions – such as product, supply, marketing, and finance – to set our strategy and drive key business initiatives. You will develop outstanding insights on our markets, competitors, and business trends and disseminate this knowledge across Agoda to inform key decisions. You help our leaders run Agoda skillfully, which includes clarifying accountability and identifying and monitoring critical success metrics.In this Role, you will get to: Lead analysts on selected projects/ requests from the top managementHelp shape and drive internal performance analysis (trends, scenarios) relevant to corporate goal settingConduct industry, and competitor data analysis to support the definition of priorities and key issuesBuild relationship with Country and Regional Directors and develop in-depth knowledge of the market context in which they operate in and their strategyDevelop draft business strategies and share with corporate strategy functionCoach analysts/manager to draft SQL queries to gather data from multiple databases within Agoda/ work with the analytics team to gather the required information for the analysisBuild Tableau dashboards to analyze the performance of Agoda and generate new insightsWhat you will Need to Succeed:Experience working in a similar role, ideally in a technology or travel focused companyDegree in BS or BA required2-4 years of Consulting experience a strong plusStrong analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong financial modeling skillsStrong knowledge of the key levers of the OTA industryAbility to think strategically, learn fast and understand new business dynamicsAbility and willingness to drive projects independently, working efficiently to deliver results rapidly and engaging the relevant stakeholders throughout the processExcellent ability to manage and influence senior stakeholdersIt is great if you have:Knowledge of SQL / Tableau or willingness to invest time to learnThis role will be based in Bangkok, Thailand. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: The People Team is a purveyor of opportunity, searching the globe for the most talented individuals and offering them an open, collaborative workplace. By prioritizing skill and potential, we have cultivated a powerful assembly of professionals through our drive for equal opportunity and diversity. We make the move to Agoda a breeze with assisted onboarding programs, and we continue to support and enrich our thousands of Agoda employees through individual growth with outstanding learning programs and various means of assistance. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility and conversion, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations. The team scope includes business development and sales, project management, trainings, contracting operations, risk assessment and collections operations, product development work and data analytics.The role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDEDKey Areas of Focus:In this role, you’ll get to: Strategy: Identify growth opportunities and prioritize investment areas for Strategic Partnerships team based on analytical insights, industry trends, and changing competitive landscape. Design, manage, and oversee the maintenance of data tools to support decision making.Commercial: Support vertical heads and account managers on pitches and partnership discussions.Performance reporting: Preparing updates on business performance, proposals, and recommendations to senior management and C-suite.Pricing Experiments: Optimize pricing strategy and make decisions based on A/B experiments.Cross-functional projects: Work with different teams inside SP (verticals, markets, operations, etc.) and outside of SP (product, marketing, supply, etc.) to drive initiatives.What you’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 6 years of total experience with Consulting, Data Analytics, Strategy, Business Development, or other relevant fields Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to break down ambiguous problems and come up with recommendations Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areasEntrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if you have: Ability to write in SQL a plus, or willingness to learn Ability to use Tableau a plus, or willingness to learn Bachelor’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility and conversion, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations. The team scope includes business development and sales, project management, trainings, contracting operations, risk assessment and collections operations, product development work and data analytics.The role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDEDKey Areas of Focus:In this role, you’ll get to: Strategy: Identify growth opportunities and prioritize investment areas for Strategic Partnerships team based on analytical insights, industry trends, and changing competitive landscape. Design, manage, and oversee the maintenance of data tools to support decision making.Commercial: Support vertical heads and account managers on pitches and partnership discussions.Performance reporting: Preparing updates on business performance, proposals, and recommendations to senior management and C-suite.Pricing Experiments: Optimize pricing strategy and make decisions based on A/B experiments.Cross-functional projects: Work with different teams inside SP (verticals, markets, operations, etc.) and outside of SP (product, marketing, supply, etc.) to drive initiatives.What you’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 6 years of total experience with Consulting, Data Analytics, Strategy, Business Development, or other relevant fields Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to break down ambiguous problems and come up with recommendations Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areasEntrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if you have: Ability to write in SQL a plus, or willingness to learn Ability to use Tableau a plus, or willingness to learn Bachelor’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to know our team: The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples: Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests. Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.The team is a fast growing and dynamic team within Supply department of Agoda. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility, conversion, pricing recommendations and financial products, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations.The Opportunity:The role sits within the Supply Analytics team under Supply department, where new business ideas, and partnership types are incubated and scaled. The right candidate will play a critical role in shaping the BI team’s overall strategy and will lead the execution of new business verticals/opportunities.This is a broad scoped role, suited to those with a track record of leading enterprise level BI function and/or creating new and high impact business verticals from scratch, from a consulting, sales or business development background with a strong entrepreneurial mindset. You will be expected to perform opportunity sizing on new business opportunities, build high level business cases to justify your proposals and work closely with Product teams to build out new features and functionalities prior to dealing directly with external partners to negotiate and close deals.We are seeking an Associate Director to lead strategic and operational initiatives that create both growth and efficiency for the Supply organization. margins in the short term with a strategic approach to take into account the reactions from the other players in the game, from customers to hotels, from competitors to regulatory bodies.To this end, algorithms.He or she will closely coordinate with Agoda’s senior management, marketing and product teams, while managing and expanding a team of talented pricing campaign managers and analysts.What build the tools to execute and monitor pricing actions and to improve price display across all channelsWork with the Market Development team to collect price benchmarking data and intelligence from local markets, and to respond to moves from competitors and hotel partnersDesign and deploy PPC Campaign actions, balancing short term financial goals with the longer term strategic imperativesManage a multi-million dollar budget and provide visibility to internal stakeholdersInspire and coach a team of analysts and campaign managers and expand it by hiring talentWhat you need to be good at to We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility, conversion, pricing recommendations and financial products, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations.The Opportunity:The role sits within the Supply Analytics team under Supply department, where new business ideas, and partnership types are incubated and scaled. Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if margins in the short term with a strategic approach to take into account the reactions from the other players in the game, from customers to hotels, from competitors to regulatory bodies.To this end, methods to break down ambiguous problems and come up with recommendations Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areasEntrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if you have: Ability to write in SQL a plus, or willingness to learn Ability to use Tableau a plus, or willingness to learn Bachelor’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team: Strategy & Analytics is fast growing and dynamic team within Strategic Partnerships department of Agoda. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility and conversion, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations. The team scope includes business development and sales, project management, trainings, contracting operations, risk assessment and collections operations, product development work and data analytics.The role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDEDKey Areas of Focus:In this role, you’ll get to: Strategy: Identify growth opportunities and prioritize investment areas for Strategic Partnerships team based on analytical insights, industry trends, and changing competitive landscape. Align SP initiatives with Booking Holdings mission and Agoda strategy.Analytics: Leverage data & tools to analyze SP performance and identify appropriate levers to improve performance.Integration: Facilitate the merger efforts of Agoda & Booking.com Strategic Partnership teams and drive the integration effort to realize synergies from the new combined structure.Performance management: Design, maintain and optimize a performance management system for the business unit, including a large team of account managersData & tools: Oversee SP data infrastructure to ensure data accuracy, completeness, and timeliness. Design, manage, and oversee the maintenance of data tools to support decision making.Commercial: Support vertical heads and account managers on pitches and partnership discussions.Performance reporting: Preparing updates on business performance, proposals, and recommendations to senior management and C-suite.Pricing Experiments: Optimize pricing strategy and make decisions based on A/B experiments.Cross-functional projects: Work with different teams inside SP (verticals, markets, operations, etc.) and outside of SP (product, marketing, supply, etc.) to drive initiatives.What you’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 6 years of total experience with Consulting, Data Analytics, Strategy, Business Development, or other relevant fields Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to break down ambiguous problems and come up with recommendations Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areasEntrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if you have: Ability to write in SQL a plus, or willingness to learn Ability to use Tableau a plus, or willingness to learn Bachelor’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Travelers chose Agoda because they are confident that they can find there the best hotels, at the best price.Success can only be achieved by combining a programmatic approach to optimize volumes and margins in the short term with a strategic approach to take into account the reactions from the other players in the game, from customers to hotels, from competitors to regulatory bodies.To this end, About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team: Strategy & Analytics is fast growing and dynamic team within Strategic Partnerships department of Agoda. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility and conversion, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations. The team scope includes business development and sales, project management, trainings, contracting operations, risk assessment and collections operations, product development work and data analytics.The role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDEDKey Areas of Focus:In this role, you’ll get to: Strategy: Identify growth opportunities and prioritize investment areas for Strategic Partnerships team based on analytical insights, industry trends, and changing competitive landscape. Align SP initiatives with Booking Holdings mission and Agoda strategy.Analytics: Leverage data & tools to analyze SP performance and identify appropriate levers to improve performance.Integration: Facilitate the merger efforts of Agoda & Booking.com Strategic Partnership teams and drive the integration effort to realize synergies from the new combined structure.Performance management: Design, maintain and optimize a performance management system for the business unit, including a large team of account managersData & tools: Oversee SP data infrastructure to ensure data accuracy, completeness, and timeliness. Design, manage, and oversee the maintenance of data tools to support decision making.Commercial: Support vertical heads and account managers on pitches and partnership discussions.Performance reporting: Preparing updates on business performance, proposals, and recommendations to senior management and C-suite.Pricing Experiments: Optimize pricing strategy and make decisions based on A/B experiments.Cross-functional projects: Work with different teams inside SP (verticals, markets, operations, etc.) and outside of SP (product, marketing, supply, etc.) to drive initiatives.What you’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 6 years of total experience with Consulting, Data Analytics, Strategy, Business Development, or other relevant fields Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to break down ambiguous problems and come up with recommendations Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areasEntrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if you have: Ability to write in SQL a plus, or willingness to learn Ability to use Tableau a plus, or willingness to learn Bachelor’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The Corporate Strategy team works directly with Agoda’s management team to provide business critical insights using analytics, ensure cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and help teams drive strategic initiatives forward. You will get to work closely with senior executives across functions – such as product, supply, marketing, and finance – to set our strategy and drive key business initiatives. You help our leaders run Agoda skillfully, which includes clarifying accountability and identifying and monitoring critical success metrics.In this Role, you will get to: Conduct industry, and competitor data analysis to support the definition of priorities and key issues Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders Create business cases for initiatives to be pursued across Agoda Support in the articulation of country/ department/ strategy Support ad-hoc projects, leading independent workstreams Support Directors/ Associate Directors in the creation of material for the Board / Management team Build SQL queries to gather data from multiple databases within Agoda/ work with the analytics team to gather the required information for the analysis What you will Need to Succeed: 2-4 years of experience at a top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity, or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company Degree in BS or BA or Quantitative field such as mathematics, engineering business, science, Strong presentation & stakeholder management skills Strong analytical and problem-solving ability Ability to think strategically, learn fast and understand new business dynamics Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes It is great if you have: Knowledge of SQL / Tableau or willingness to invest time to learn Some knowledge of the key levers of the OTA industry This role will be based in Bangkok, Thailand. By prioritizing skill and potential, we have cultivated a powerful assembly of professionals through our drive for equal opportunity and diversity. We make the move to Agoda a breeze with assisted onboarding programs, and we continue to support and enrich our thousands of Agoda employees through individual growth with outstanding learning programs and various means of assistance. Our development of incredible benefits has ensured everyone can stay strong, healthy, and happy during their time at Agoda. Leading ambitious changes and making a positive impact in the lives of our employees, the People Team is a crucial and rewarding part of the Agoda family. The Opportunity We are looking for a People BI Specialist whose main focus areas are providing visibility and insights for people-related issues through Business Intelligence tools like Tableau and SQL, managing data warehouses, building ETL processes, and helping build other tools to optimize the business. This would entail liaising with key stakeholders in the People team, IT team, and other teams to provide the data tools and support necessary for the business. About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to know our team: The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples: Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests. Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders What you’ll Need to Succeed: Bachelor’s degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject e.g. strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company Experience in one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g., SQL, SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA and visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, impact and influence outcomes Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently It’s great if you have: Experience in digital marketing or e-commerce Experience margins in the short term with a strategic approach to take into account the reactions from the other players in the game, from customers to hotels, from competitors to regulatory bodies.To this end, we are looking for a senior leader to craft Agoda’s global strategic Pay per click strategy and execute upon it, using a wide range of tactics and tools, from price display to machine learning algorithms.He or she will closely coordinate with Agoda’s senior management, marketing and product teams, while managing and expanding a team of talented pricing campaign managers and analysts.What build the tools to execute and monitor pricing actions and to improve price display across all channelsWork with the Market Development team to collect price benchmarking data and intelligence from local markets, and to respond to moves from competitors and hotel partnersDesign and deploy PPC Campaign actions, balancing short term financial goals with the longer term strategic imperativesManage a multi-million dollar budget and provide visibility to internal stakeholdersInspire and coach a team of analysts and campaign managers and expand it by hiring talentWhat you need to be good at to About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team: Strategy & Analytics is fast growing and dynamic team within Strategic Partnerships department of Agoda. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth, visibility and conversion, as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations. The team scope includes business development and sales, project management, trainings, contracting operations, risk assessment and collections operations, product development work and data analytics.The role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDEDKey Areas of Focus:In this role, you’ll get to: Strategy: Identify growth opportunities and prioritize investment areas for Strategic Partnerships team based on analytical insights, industry trends, and changing competitive landscape. Align SP initiatives with Booking Holdings mission and Agoda strategy.Analytics: Leverage data & tools to analyze SP performance and identify appropriate levers to improve performance.Integration: Facilitate the merger efforts of Agoda & Booking.com Strategic Partnership teams and drive the integration effort to realize synergies from the new combined structure.Performance management: Design, maintain and optimize a performance management system for the business unit, including a large team of account managersData & tools: Oversee SP data infrastructure to ensure data accuracy, completeness, and timeliness. Design, manage, and oversee the maintenance of data tools to support decision making.Commercial: Support vertical heads and account managers on pitches and partnership discussions.Performance reporting: Preparing updates on business performance, proposals, and recommendations to senior management and C-suite.Pricing Experiments: Optimize pricing strategy and make decisions based on A/B experiments.Cross-functional projects: Work with different teams inside SP (verticals, markets, operations, etc.) and outside of SP (product, marketing, supply, etc.) to drive initiatives.What you’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 6 years of total experience with Consulting, Data Analytics, Strategy, Business Development, or other relevant fields Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to break down ambiguous problems and come up with recommendations Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areasEntrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with ability to work well across multiple stakeholders It’s Great if you have: Ability to write in SQL a plus, or willingness to learn Ability to use Tableau a plus, or willingness to learn Bachelor’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The Corporate Strategy team works directly with Agoda’s management team to provide business critical insights using analytics, ensure cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and help teams drive strategic initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations and help evolve early-stage ideas into high impact opportunities.The Opportunity:As a Senior Analyst/Lead, you will be focusing on information generation and strategy formulation at business level. You will get to work closely with senior executives across functions – such as product, supply, marketing, and finance – to set our strategy and drive key business initiatives. You help our leaders run Agoda skillfully, which includes clarifying accountability and identifying and monitoring critical success metrics.In this Role, you will get to: Conduct industry, and competitor data analysis to support the definition of priorities and key issues Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders Create business cases for initiatives to be pursued across Agoda Support in the articulation of country/ department/ strategy Support ad-hoc projects, leading independent workstreams Support Directors/ Associate Directors in the creation of material for the Board / Management team Build SQL queries to gather data from multiple databases within Agoda/ work with the analytics team to gather the required information for the analysis What you will Need to Succeed: 2-4 years of experience at a top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity, or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company Degree in BS or BA or Quantitative field such as mathematics, engineering business, science, Strong presentation & stakeholder management skills Strong analytical and problem-solving ability Ability to think strategically, learn fast and understand new business dynamics Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes It is great if you have: Knowledge of SQL / Tableau or willingness to invest time to learn Some knowledge of the key levers of the OTA industry This role will be based in Bangkok, Thailand. Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence(AI) are revolutionizing the way of doing business at a global scale. sennder is a European digital freight forwarder with a data-centric problem-solving approach to build the next generation of supply chain and road logistics services. Do you want to help us to shape the future?We are looking for a (Senior) Machine Learning Engineer (MLOps) to join our central ML Recommendations team - as part of sennAI department. The department’s mission is to achieve “Automated & Data-Driven Road Logistics”.
